title: Message from OldFriend
content: It's been a while! Let's catch up soon.

title: Message from Colleague
content: Great job on the presentation today!

title: Message from Boss
content: Please review the document I sent you.

title: Message from Family
content: Don't forget about the family dinner next week.

title: Message from Neighbor
content: Can you water my plants while I'm away?

title: Message from Gym
content: Your membership renewal is due soon.

title: Message from Bank
content: Your account statement is now available.

title: Message from School
content: Parent-teacher meeting is scheduled for next Monday.

title: Message from Doctor
content: Your appointment has been confirmed for tomorrow.
